entry.title: About
entry.summary:
Welcome!

This site is the official website of GeoPython. Pleave leave a message here or open an issue on github. You can also visit the ResearchGate page.

For Chinese users, please visit ChinaGeology.

If you find out there is anything you donot like on GeoPython or if you have any â€¦
entry.content:
Welcome!

This site is the official website of GeoPython. Pleave leave a message here or open an issue on github. You can also visit the ResearchGate page.

For Chinese users, please visit ChinaGeology.

If you find out there is anything you donot like on GeoPython or if you have any idea or function need to be done, just tell us please.
